arts.ttl: “To put it bluntly” | Fullkrug confesses to abysmal start to West Ham career
arts.sum: Niclas Fullkrug admits he has had an “absolutely awful” start to life at West Ham, hinting that the move wasn’t right for him. After his performance against Brighton today, it’s clear to see that Niclas Fullkrug isn’t the right man for Julen Lopetegui. Questions have to be asked over the recruitment of the German because... arts.ttl: “Cancel his contract” | West Ham may terminate deal of Summer flop
arts.sum: West Ham could cancel the contract of a failed Summer signing as early as January. Many fans had claimed that West Ham had “won the Summer transfer window”, but this couldn’t have been further from the truth. Bar Aaron Wan-Bissaka, Max Kilman, and Crysencio Summerville, there’s still varying degrees of doubt as to whether the... arts.ttl: Journalist says West Ham & Brighton should be 'Ashamed' after 1-1 draw

arts.ttl: Kudus: No one can copy my Ghana stool celebration
arts.sum: Mohammed Kudus took his celebrations up a notch on Saturday after he hit the equaliser for West Ham United at home to Brighton & Hove Albion and shared a piece of his homeland Ghana. Kudus's Ghanaian stool celebration
